now we know that there are certain

you name it now what's very interesting

it contains the subject line

reference to Struck's

Deputy Assistant Director
counterintelligence division not section
chief which is a CIA post so there is

struck really a CIA agent put into the

to this document it seems that way and
if this document is actually real then
he was a plant in the whole thing very
interesting now we know that Mueller put
out the indictments during or right

to accept on faith because there's

to implicate Moscow now when we take a

indictment identifies by name and
position
the 12 alleged Gio GRU officers who

go ahead and say I would like to do this

connected to GRU cyber operations that

beyond top secret
now since Mueller really had no case
really didn't have any information on

they needed to come up with something of

what they did not do however is provide

to connect the same to the Russian

where he did it and how he got the

here they they didn't make any type of

is not contained in the document itself
there is a clear misunderstanding
regarding how a sophisticated
intelligence organizations which

it would not be run by twelve

everyone will be working in alias on

there'd be no sending or receiving them

we will allow Mueller to come over and

they made many different agreements they
